about_the_game:
Introducing the playable character, hailing from the jungles, the Jaguar! He is a blood-thirsty pious Aztec-like warrior. Wielding a mighty macuahuitl, he serves his gods by the sacrifice of blood from his enemies. His unique abilities change reshape his playstyle, a high risk-high rewarding game. Calling upon his gods he can cast blood magics that can turn an otherwise hopeless situation into a bloodbath. Appease the gods, slap them with your obsidian edged mace, and become the Jaguar.

This DLC comes with

The Jaguar character
New items
A new familiar
A new legendary staff
More spells
A new hat
detailed_description:
Introducing the playable character, hailing from the jungles, the Jaguar! He is a blood-thirsty pious Aztec-like warrior. Wielding a mighty macuahuitl, he serves his gods by the sacrifice of blood from his enemies. His unique abilities change reshape his playstyle, a high risk-high rewarding game. Calling upon his gods he can cast blood magics that can turn an otherwise hopeless situation into a bloodbath. Appease the gods, slap them with your obsidian edged mace, and become the Jaguar.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Pretty much any computer will do.

short_description: A pious blood-thirsty warrior with an insatiable need to sacrifice the blood of his enemies to his gods. He wields his blood-letting macuahuitl and calls upon blood magic to bleed his foes. Blood.
